Articles.Content:
So I have Kerbalism installed and that means living space is important, but Kerbalism only really adds a single part, the rotating inflatable crew module, to help with that.  

I would like to have a couple more inflatable modules, I know there are some in SSPX, but I didn't want to add a big mod with a lot of parts.  What else is out there that will still work in 1.10.1 with Kerbalism?

Inflatable modules aren’t always a good idea with Kerbalism as you need to inflate them, which uses A LOT of nitrogen unless you launch them already inflated, which defeats the purpose of them being inflatable in the first place. SSPX is still the best option that I know of, you can always delete the parts you don’t want before running the game to save on memory/part clutter.
Ven's Stock Revamp has some inflatable modules, but I don't know how it works with Kerbalism.

1 hour ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

Inflatable modules aren’t always a good idea with Kerbalism as you need to inflate them, which uses A LOT of nitrogen unless you launch them already inflated, which defeats the purpose of them being inflatable in the first place. SSPX is still the best option that I know of, you can always delete the parts you don’t want before running the game to save on memory/part clutter.

I think this is a good answer if you don't want to add a lot of parts.  Pick and choose from the pack and only add parts to your game if you think they'll provide benefit.
